name: Sloth Patrol
description:
Sloth Patrol is a 100% realistic sloth simulator. The game is based on years of painstaking research by Dr Jacques Girardeau, the world's preeminent sloth behavioral expert. Dr Girardeau spent 18 months living in the trees of Central America studying a sloth clan for the purposes of designing this game. The clan of sloths slowly attacked him each day for invading its territory.

In Sloth Patrol, you play Julio Treewalker, a top fighter pilot enlisted to protect the sloth homeworld of Slothonia. Opposing you is the evil Possum Empire, which is intent on galactic domination. Possum forces are led by the evil Colonel Hisser, the sworn enemy of Julio Treewalker.

With the help of your commanding officer, Admiral Leafchewer, you will join Julio in his battles against the Possum Empire. Help Julio rid the galaxy of Possum tyranny!
